custom-meta.meta-value: Committee on Technical Barriers to Trade

named-book-part-body.p: The following notification is being circulated in accordance with Article 10.6

td.style: border-left: double 0.75pt; border-top: double 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
border-top: double 0.75pt; border-right: double 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
td.bold: If applicable, name of local government involved (Article 3.2 and 7.2):

td.style: border-left: double 0.75pt; border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-right: double 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt

tr.td: Agency responsible: Korean Agency for Technology and Standards (KATS)Name and address (including telephone and fax numbers, email and website addresses, if available) of agency or authority designated to handle comments regarding the notification shall be indicated if different from above:Electrical & Telecommunications Product Safety DivisionKorean Agency for Technology and StandardsMinistry of Trade, Industry and Energy93, Isu-ro, Maengdong-myeon, Eumseong-gun, Chungcheongbuk-do, 27737 Republic of KoreaTel.: (+82) 43 870 5443 Fax: (+82) 43 870 5676 email: psd0@korea.krWebsite: http://www.kats.go.kr

td.style: border-left: double 0.75pt; border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-right: double 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
border-left: double 0.75pt; border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-right: double 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt

tr.td: Products covered (HS or CCCN where applicable, otherwise national tariff heading. ICS numbers may be provided in addition, where applicable): Appliances for heating liquids

td.style: border-left: double 0.75pt; border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-right: double 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt

tr.td: Title, number of pages and language(s) of the notified document: Technical Regulations for Electrical and Telecommunication Products and Components: Amendment of Technical Regulations for Household and similar electrical appliances – Safety, Part 2-15: Particular requirements for appliances for heating liquids (KC 60335-2-15) (39 page(s), in Korean)

td.style: border-left: double 0.75pt; border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-right: double 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt

tr.td: Description of content: Particular requirements for appliances for heating liquids (KC 60335-2-15) will be harmonized with relevant international standards (IEC 60335-2-15). The main modification is as below.To add test methods and clarify the condition of test (Clause 15, 19, 20 and etc. )To add terms and definition (Clause 3)

td.style: border-left: double 0.75pt; border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-right: double 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt

tr.td: Objective and rationale, including the nature of urgent problems where applicable: Harmonization

td.style: border-left: double 0.75pt; border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-right: double 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
border-left: double 0.75pt; border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-right: double 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt

tr.td: Proposed date of adoption: To be determinedProposed date of entry into force: To be determined

td.style: border-left: double 0.75pt; border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt
border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-right: double 0.75pt; border-bottom: solid 0.75pt

tr.td: Final date for comments: 60 days from notification

td.style: border-left: double 0.75pt; border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-bottom: double 0.75pt
border-top: solid 0.75pt; border-right: double 0.75pt; border-bottom: double 0.75pt

tr.td: Texts available from: National enquiry point [X] or address, telephone and fax numbers and email and website addresses, if available, of other body:Korea WTO TBT Enquiry PointTechnical Barriers to Trade (TBT) DivisionKorean Agency for Technology and Standards (KATS)93 Isu-ro Maengdong-myeon Eumseong-gunChungchungbuk-do 27737+(82) 43 870 5525+(82) 43 870 5682 (Fax)tbt@korea.krhttp://www.knowtbt.krhttps://members.wto.org/crnattachments/2021/TBT/KOR/21_7436_00_x.pdfhttps://members.wto.org/crnattachments/2021/TBT/KOR/21_7436_01_x.pdf
